message.phoneOrEmailWarning: You should pass either a phone number or an email address.

message.singleAddContactSuccess: Your contact has been successfully added.
message.multiAddContactSuccess: Your contact has been successfully added, you can add another contact.
message.editContactSuccess: Your contact has been successfully edited.

fileSelection.title: Import Options
fileSelection.description: Please select a file containing your contacts or copy/paste them.

errors.file-too-large: File is too large, and exceeds the limit: {{count}}MB
errors.file-invalid-type: Invalid file upload. Your uploaded file should be of type: excel or csv.

copyPaste.title: Copy/Paste
copyPaste.description: Copy and paste contacts from your .csv, .xls, or .xlsx file

fieldsMapping.title: Map Fields
fieldsMapping.description: Please map the columns in the imported file to one of the contacts fields. Make sure your imported phone numbers includes country code.

labels.invalidFile: No File uploaded, or an error occurred with current file. Please retry.
labels.addTagsGroups: You have the option to either choose an existing group or tags, or create new ones

fileReview.title: Review
fileReview.description: Check all details before importing your contacts' details

validations.groups: All imported contacts are related to this group {{groups}}
validations.groups_other: All imported contacts are related to these groups {{groups}}
validations.tags: All imported contacts are related to this tag {{tags}}
validations.tags_other: All imported contacts are related to these tags {{tags}}

otherErrors.label: Errors
otherErrors.invalidPhoneNumbers: 1 phone number will be skipped since it already exist.
otherErrors.invalidPhoneNumbers_other: {{count}} phone numbers will be skipped since they already exist.
otherErrors.invalidEmails: 1 email address will be skipped since it already exists.
otherErrors.invalidEmails_other: {{count}} email addresses will be skipped since they already exist.
otherErrors.failedInputs: 1 invalid input, and will be skipped.
otherErrors.failedInputs_other: {{count}} invalid inputs, and will be skipped.

validations.note: <0>Note:</0> Any rows that contain errors will not be imported. You can <2>Export Error File</2> for further information.

message.invalidData: Invalid data was passed. Try refreshing the page and restart your action if the problem persists.

addSegment.tooltip: It's optional. You can create it as a segment and it will be add automatically in the segments management.

editSegment.tooltip: Please note that any adaptations here will affect the segment on "Segment Management".

deleteContacts.message: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
deleteContacts.message_zero: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
deleteContacts.message_other: Are you sure you want to delete ({{count}}) selected contacts? Deleting contacts is permenant and cannot be undone.

addTags.title: Add Tags
addTags.message: Are you sure you want to add tags to ({{count}}) selected contact? Adding tags is permenant and cannot be undone.
addTags.message_other: Are you sure you want to add tags to ({{count}}) selected contacts? Adding tags is permenant and cannot be undone.
addTags.success: Tags added to selected contacts successfully.

removeTags.title: Remove Tags
removeTags.message: Are you sure you want to remove tags from ({{count}}) selected contact? Removing tags is permenant and cannot be undone.
removeTags.message_other: Are you sure you want to remove tags from ({{count}}) selected contacts? Removing tags is permenant and cannot be undone.
removeTags.success: Tags were removed from selected contacts successfully.

addToGroups.title: Add Groups
addToGroups.message: Are you sure you want to add groups to ({{count}}) selected contact? Adding groups is permenant and cannot be undone.
addToGroups.message_other: Are you sure you want to add groups to ({{count}}) selected contacts? Adding groups is permenant and cannot be undone.
addToGroups.success: Contacts were added to selected groups successfully.

removeFromGroups.title: Remove Groups
removeFromGroups.message: Are you sure you want to remove groups from ({{count}}) selected contact? Removing groups is permenant and cannot be undone.
removeFromGroups.message_other: Are you sure you want to remove groups from ({{count}}) selected contacts? Removing groups is permenant and cannot be undone.
removeFromGroups.success: Contacts were removed from selected groups successfully.

emptyView.headline: You don't have contacts yet
emptyView.message: Create new contacts or import your own list of contacts to start sending you campaigns
